metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16468 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
In the Loofah gem for Ruby, through v2.2.2, unsanitized JavaScript may occur in sanitized output when a crafted SVG element is republished.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16468` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-loofah - 2.0.3-2+deb9u2build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-loofah package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.3-2+deb9u2build0.16.04.1').
